Package org.efaps.util

This package contains some utility classes that are needed inside eFaps e.g.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateTimeUtil
    Date and time utility class to handle the time zone from the eFaps correctly.
    MsgFormat
    TODO comment!
    RequestHandler
    The request handler converts URL with macros to URL without macros and correct application paths.

    Enumeration to define different possible calendars and to handle the conversions between than.

    The class is the exception class used to throw exception.

Package org.efaps.util Description

This package contains some utility classes that are needed inside eFaps e.g. to throw eFaps Exceptions etc..
